description: The PL_SYSTEMS table contains body system data from patients' problem lists in the clinical system.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: PROB_LIST_SYSTEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is a link to the System category associated with the Problem List System record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Circulatory


Digestive


Endocrine


Immune


Integumentary


Muscular


Nervous


Reproductive


Respiratory


Skeletal


Urinary
